Kajwang’s family claimed that he complained of chest pains and declared dead few hours after being admitted at The Mater Hospital. The Government pathologist didn’t give a conclusive cause of Otieno Kajwang’s death, leading to rumours that he might have been poisoned. Some reckless opposition politicians even moved around the Country using Otieno Kajwang’s death to politick. They said that he was killed by the Government. But Kajwang’s family may have ordered the Government pathologist to ‘hush’ about his death after finding out the real cause of death. contentWithMarkup:
Saturday, June 2, 2018 - On November 19, 2014, Kenyans were shocked to hear about the sudden death of the late witty Homa Bay Senator, Otieno Kajwang.

Kajwang’s family claimed that he complained of chest pains and declared dead few hours after being admitted at The Mater Hospital.


The Government pathologist didn’t give a conclusive cause of Otieno Kajwang’s death, leading to rumours that he might have been poisoned.

Some reckless opposition politicians even moved around the Country using Otieno Kajwang’s death to politick.

They said that he was killed by the Government.

But Kajwang’s family may have ordered the Government pathologist to ‘hush’ about his death after finding out the real cause of death.

We can now confirm that the late Immigration Minister died after overdosing on V!@gra.

This was included in the…
